# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="7cf7d-102">关闭重点收件箱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7cf7d-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7cf7d-103">在页面顶部，选择齿轮图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7cf7d-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7cf7d-104">以打开 "设置" 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7cf7d-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="7cf7d-105">在 "设置" 窗格中，将**重点收件箱**切换移到 "关闭"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7cf7d-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7cf7d-106">有关详细信息，请参阅[关闭重点收件箱](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7cf7d-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb).</span></span>
